title: Sometimes you just cant climb
body: Just saying my opinion, im a plat 2 player i dont play alot of ranked but i played a little at the start of the season, my win rate is 53% nothing crazy but i consider myself a pretty good player, i always do well in lane and think i know the game pretty well, and then i created this account to play on with a friend and hell broke loose, i hit gold 5 this season on this account with i think rougly 23W 18L, since then i have hit 24W 35L, almost every game is absolutely ridiculous , over half the games have had an AFK or two and ive seen 0/18 zeds in my time, now it doesnt really matter to me because i can play on my other account with normal people. but MAYBE, just maybe, there are some good players out there who cant climb through the tilt,if i have had 10 games of just abolute chimps, maybe people have had 20? 30? so why do people lose LP with 3 afks on there team?

replies.body: This would be interesting if you actually were a plat player and not just a jaded bronzie talking shit. No plat 2 player has any trouble getting out of gold, unless you got lucky and carried through on your other account.

its a 5v5 game do the math when someone goes afk or tilts 

guess the op was talking about you when he said chimps

Alright then fucko, let's do some "math". 

There are five players on each team. One of them is you. That leaves four unknown quantities on your team and five on the other. So, statistically speaking, there's more chance of the other team having an afk or "tilt" whatever that is. Neck up, parrot.

I might be a chimp but at least I'm not stuck in silver after almost 1000 games.

Bronzie here,ive always found within low elo theres no middle ground,you either get stomped in every lane or your team stomps,sometimes you get that rare evenly matched game but its few and far between..... i barely even play ranked anymore

OH MY FUCKING HELL! Some real evidence, shall we call it? A Platinum 2 player who at low rank cannot climb, love it.

I have only been stating since THE START OF THIS FUCKING SEASON, IT, SUCKS, BALLS!

You can't climb, period. Riot are listening to the top 1% or less of players and making changes to their queue system to allow them to have better games, what about the rest of us? What about everyone else who cannot get that high? You are catering for no one, the majority of your players cannot get to where you are putting all your efforts.

Go check out my last ranked game from last night I played, not my last game I just played, the last game for the night of 15th June AEST, I had to pull out a game of legend status just for a win that we almost lost, and for what? Just so I can have 3 more losses and stay at Silver 5?

Get your shit together Riot and do something to allow those who actually know how to play to get out of this shit ELO.

I note again, and will keep noting again and again, this: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_OnJYBr6JuiY0dPOG5QUjRXQ1k/view?usp=sharing

A nice little spreadsheet I put together that will allow players who know how to play, who get good stats to gain LP regardless if they win or lose.

My game last night, where I had most kills, towers, CS, the lot and TRIPLE DAMAGE of 7 other players, I get a player on the enemy team after 48 minutes at level 17 by the time the game ends. Who the fuck can't get to level 18 in 48 minutes? And he nearly got a win for that game thanks to my retarded team.
3.9 hp heals dayum thats alot... whats that 3.9 hp out of 100? out of 1000?

That is 3.9K, like all the stats on that page, it is thousand dropped down to a more easily to input number. You really think the top player damage was only 17.4 total? Or 207.9 damage dealt? It's 17,400 and 207,900.

I made it so I can basically copy pasta in some form the stats from the player match history instead of just typing it all in.

EDIT: In case you were wondering, I was Garen in that game and purposely put that game in to show that those players who think a high CS will give you an S score, it does not. I had the same kills as Bard, less deaths, more damage, a higher level and more CS, but Bard still got a positive score and I got a negative one, showing that team work and playing how it matters will give you what you deserve.

This game is less about skill and more about luck. I feel like their RNG from loot boxes has drifted into matchmaking code. Some games I can have teams of equal skill and others I get teams who go 0-9-0 and blame everyone else. People need to understand that not dying is more important than getting kills. When you're alive you can defend and siege objectives which surprisingly is what wins you the game. Shocker.
This is beautiful evidence that proves what  low elo players have been saying for the past 6 months, RIOT LISTEN TO THIS
riot has earmuffs on and are watching crocs drag away children, maybe when they get bored of that they will

Dont bother mate, whenever i tell these cucks about the perils of low elo players they ignore me because "if you belonged in a higher elo you would be there"

All they are gonna do is tell you that you got boosted to plat or something to defend their argument.

p.s. ignore my match history last week or so ive had a roommate just torrent nonstop and bring around grills who just hog the wifi, ive had like 1 or 2 games where i didnt have 3k ping in my last 20 games and those 2 games stand out like a sore thumb.

No. Fucking no. I for one will not give up. I am not OP's second or third account BTW, just some long time player who is getting rather angry at Riot's disgust at how they treat low ELO players, for that matter, all new players who don't have a team that they can pubstomp lowbies with.

I am sick of this shit Riot put on us and the general community telling us "If you were good enough blah blah blah". Fuck them, fuck the lot of them. This season has gone so far down the toilet that it is being recycled in the shit factory that stores our week old diarrhoea.

It is fucking retarded, never in 5 years of playing have I ever had a ranked season this hard to even get a win, let alone get out of low ranking and I FLAT OUT REFUSE to fold to Riot's wishful thinking that we will all one day end up being chum buddies and sucking ass to get a team together so we can play their game. NONE OF US SHOULD.

I'm a long time player too and I agree with all of this. The game at the moment is broken for everyone except assassin mains and tank ekko/fizz players. I cant drag myself out of bronze. You know why? Every time i manage to drag myself to silver I get a streak of teams who give up, afk or fight between eachother. 4-1 votes to give up should not count as a loss for the person who wanted to stay and fight on. Afker's should be punished harder than people who actually leave, but even then a 4v5 game shouldn't count to LP loss. I know it's open to abuse for people boosting, but really.. when was the last time you won a 4v5 when your mid laner just leaves 10 minutes into the game after being fed all your teams kills. 

On top of all that shit is the fact that no matter how much you destroy some champions in lane pre-6.. as soon as they get that ulti.. you have literally no way to counter them. Here's looking you you zed. You too ekko you asshat. And i dare ANY of you to buy a f***ing zhonyas on your kallista or other AD champ to counter that s***. Cus thats all you have.
